author: mariadalfonso
body:
This PR move Mahi from double to float.
Small differences seen in the energy, more on the arrivalTime.
http://dalfonso.web.cern.ch/dalfonso/HCAL/HCAL_PR28366.pdf

In addition 20% speed up gain is achieved in the minimize function see igprof results below
